We value your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how FinLog collects, uses, and protects your personal information.

 **1. Data Collection**
 We collect information such as financial records, card details, and account balances to provide our services. This data is stored locally on your device.

 **2. Data Usage**
 Your data is used solely to manage your financial records within the app. We do not share your information with third parties.

 **3. Data Security**
 We use secure methods to store your data locally. However, you are responsible for securing your device.

 **4. Changes to This Policy**
 We may update this policy from time to time. Please review it periodically.

 If you have any questions, please contact us at support@finlogapp.com.

We’re here to help you with FinLog!

 **Contact Us**
 Email: support@finlogapp.com

 **Frequently Asked Questions**
 - **How do I add a new record?**
 Go to the Records tab and click the "+" button to add a new record.
 - **How do I back up my data?**
 Go to the Menu tab and select "Create Backup" to save your data.
 - **How do I restore my data?**
 Go to the Menu tab and select "Restore Backup" to recover your data.

 For more help, please email us, and we’ll get back to you as soon as possible!
